DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effects of exercise on diverse cardiometabolic risk factors and indicators of atherosclerosis in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM).
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Exercise on sRAGE Levels and Cardiometabolic Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes stable body weight sedentary lifestyle smoked cigarettes cardiovascular disease chronic kidney chronic liver disease pregnant or breastfeeding any other major illness
